actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act and the Contract Work Hours and Safety Standards Act to change the workday for employees who are employed under contracts subject to those acts from 8 to 10 hours per day.

summary.text: Changes, under the Walsh-Healy Act and the Contract Work Hours and Safety Standards Act, (relating to public contracts), the workday for employees who are employed under contracts subject to those Acts from eight to ten hours per day.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act and the Contract Work Hours and Safety Standards Act to change the workday for employees who are employed under contracts subject to those acts from 8 to 10 hours per day.
